subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, still hampered by a thumb injury, withdrew yesterday from next week’s Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif. Williams has withdrawn from three tournaments since injuring her left thumb and calf at Wimbledon.
snippet: Serena Williams, still hampered by a thumb injury, withdrew yesterday from next week’s Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif. Williams has withdrawn from three tournaments since injuring her left thumb and calf at Wimbledon.
